page.shortlink: api desktop api sys id show function
page.description: SYS_ID_SHOW() opens the window specified by Window_Name.

argument.name: window_name
argument.description: The name of the window as reported by SYS_ID_ENUM()or seen on the window's title bar.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example uses SYS_ID_ENUM() to list the available windows, then uses SYS_ID_SHOW() to display the "Norton AntiVirus" window.
section.example: sys_id_enum() -> Start Menu Norton AntiVirus NetDDE Agent Alpha Anywhere - [Code Editor] Positioning . . . sys_id_show("Norton AntiVirus")
